notes: Activities include expected outputs; positions inherit expected_outputs from R/A roles.

activities.name: Expand market via historical database
activities.expected_output: Updated lead list / CRM records (validated, de-duplicated)

activities.name: Re-call existing customer (visit, email, phone)
activities.expected_output: Visit/call/email logs filed in CRM; follow-up status

activities.name: Re-activate inactive customers
activities.expected_output: Reactivation attempt log and outcome (won/lost/ongoing)

activities.name: Contract understanding to expand market
activities.expected_output: Contract summary sheet incl. scope, terms, opportunities

activities.name: Change spot market to regular market
activities.expected_output: Conversion plan & approval memo; target account list

activities.name: Identify list cluster customer priority
activities.expected_output: Prioritized customer/commodity cluster list with rationale

activities.name: Increase company branding & service excellence
activities.expected_output: Campaign brief & post-campaign report; service excellence note

activities.name: Develop networking / synergy (sister companies, vendors, etc.)
activities.expected_output: Relationship/partner pipeline sheet; meeting notes

activities.name: Company branding via website, LinkedIn, community; SEO & digital marketing
activities.expected_output: Digital performance report (web/LinkedIn analytics)

activities.name: Add customer database (Google, organizations/associations, authorized government)
activities.expected_output: New data-source log; appended & validated contact dataset

activities.name: Join community / business organization; canvassing
activities.expected_output: Community membership/attendance log; canvassing record

activities.name: Identify potential commodity & competitor weakness
activities.expected_output: Competitor/commodity analysis memo with implications

activities.name: Market & product substitution analysis
activities.expected_output: Substitution analysis report incl. risk/opportunity matrix

activities.name: Discovery call & qualify prospects; stakeholder map
activities.expected_output: Qualified prospect record with BANT/GPCT & stakeholder map

activities.name: Company profile / capability presentation; customer visits
activities.expected_output: Presentation attendance list & feedback notes; shared deck link

activities.name: Capture SLA, pricing/TOP expectation, quality, product & services, payment
activities.expected_output: Customer requirement form (SLA/pricing/TOP/quality/scope/payment)

activities.name: Assessment (quality, legal/permits, financial credibility)
activities.expected_output: Feasibility & risk assessment sheet (quality/legal/finance)

activities.name: Solution design; CI opportunities; one-stop service; QA & payment scheme
activities.expected_output: Solution design summary (technical & commercial) with CI ideas

activities.name: Compile proposal (profile, portfolio, compliance, technical method, value)
activities.expected_output: Complete proposal pack (profile, compliance, method, value)

activities.name: Make quotation (pricing, validity); internal cost eval; approvals
activities.expected_output: Approved quotation (pricing/TOP/validity) with approval trail

activities.name: Run negotiations (price, TOP, scope, validity) & document results
activities.expected_output: Negotiation minutes and agreed term changes

activities.name: Contract evaluation & PO confirmation; handover; order monitoring
activities.expected_output: Signed contract/PO confirmation; handover & kickoff checklist

positions.title: SVP OF SALES & MARKETING
job_duties: Own total Sales & Marketing strategy and P&L targets
Set pricing/TOP policy and delegation framework
Coach GMs and SM of Marketing; clear cross-function roadblocks
Review funnel, margins, SLA adherence; report to leadership

job_duties: Lead Sales SIG department; own revenue/margin for SIG accounts
